post.summary: Create a new comment on a post

content.description: The content of the new comment

user_id.description: The ID of the user who created the comment

post_id.description: The ID of the post the comment was created on

updated_at.description: The date and time the comment was last updated

error.description: The error message indicating the user is not authorized to update the comment

success.description: A boolean indicating whether the deletion was successful

Message.description: A message indicating the comment was deleted successfully

error.description: The error message indicating the user is not authorized to delete the comment
